title: What We All Saw
description: Witches only exist in stories. Everyone knows that. But what if the stories are real?FOUR FRIENDS. FOUR TRUTHS. ONE NIGHTMARE.If you wander into the wood …If you hear scratching sounds from the Old Quarry …If you go too close to the edge …WATCH. OUT.Prime Minister's Literary Award (Shortlisted, 2023)CBCA Book of the Year - Older Readers (Shortlisted, 2023)The Readings Prize for Young Adults (Shortlisted, 2022)
author: Mike  Lucas
